prompt:
A boldly alluring Korean woman in her 20s on a seaside wooden porch after a light splash of
seawater, golden hour.
Pose: sitting sideways on the porch edge, hips angled forward, spine subtly arched; one hand
gripping the wood edge, the other brushing wet hair back.
Expression: unwavering eye contact, narrowed half-lidded eyes, soft parted lips, no smile.
Outfit: wet white cotton t-shirt (non-transparent) clinging subtly with darker damp patches,
visible wet fabric tension lines and micro-wrinkles; denim shorts.
Lighting: warm backlight + soft bounce fill, smooth highlight roll-off, mild sun bloom.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain.
Exclusions: no text/logos; tasteful, non-explicit; realistic pores; no HDR, no hyper-clarity.
